description: This file handles AJAX requests related to wireless network configuration, including settings for WiFi radio enabling/disabling, WPS configuration, MAC filtering, band steering, and other wireless parameters. It processes JSON input, performs validation, and interacts with device configuration parameters.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates a WPS PIN checksum based on the input string.

methods.name: validFilterParam
methods.description: Validates filter parameters for MAC address and character printability.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies settings to a specific SSID, primarily toggling its enabled state.
